commit_message:
Rework NTP in FuelMenu be disabled if no gateway

It should be simpler to be able to start using
Fuel with no gateway or DNS. Therefore, NTP
will default to disabled with no valid gateway
configured. In most deployments, except those
in automated tests where dhcp_interface option
is provided in kernel options, NTP will be
disabled until the user re-enables it after
configuring their gateway.

Change-Id: I9cc7ba5a8e64468ab32d03d2afd8b055ffd80539
Closes-Bug: #1263934

subject: Remove create_export from volume create
revisions:
[{'number': 11, 'created': '2014-02-04 13:39:45.000000000', 'files': ['cinder/volume/flows/manager/create_volume.py', 'cinder/volume/manager.py', 'cinder/volume/driver.py', 'cinder/exception.py', 'cinder/volume/rpcapi.py', 'cinder/brick/iscsi/iscsi.py', 'cinder/tests/test_volume.py', 'cinder/volume/drivers/lvm.py'], 'message': "Remove create_export from volume create

Currently the LVM driver creates iscsi targets on
volume creation, even though it's only used at
attach time.  This isn't necessary and in fact
causes issues if a volume is extended because the
target information isn't currently updated after the
extend.  In addition a number of other drivers inclduing
the LIO iscsi driver require the target be created with
initiator info, so the tgt that's created initially
again isn't valid.

This change removes the create_export call from the
volume create process and makes it part of the
managers intialize_connection routine which is
more appropriate.

This change also removes the target on detach since
it's not used any longer and again as the volume may
be modified or extended.

Change-Id: I0b7dfdaf7e49a069da22f22f459861b0b49430a4
Closes-Bug: 1248947
"}]
commit_message:
Remove create_export from volume create

Currently the LVM driver creates iscsi targets on
volume creation, even though it's only used at
attach time.  This isn't necessary and in fact
causes issues if a volume is extended because the
target information isn't currently updated after the
extend.  In addition a number of other drivers inclduing
the LIO iscsi driver require the target be created with
initiator info, so the tgt that's created initially
again isn't valid.

This change removes the create_export call from the
volume create process and makes it part of the
managers intialize_connection routine which is
more appropriate.

This change also removes the target on detach since
it's not used any longer and again as the volume may
be modified or extended.

Change-Id: I0b7dfdaf7e49a069da22f22f459861b0b49430a4
Closes-Bug: 1248947

commit_message:
Escape double quotes in shell formatter

Before this change the shell formatter could not be trusted to output
anything with double quotes. With this change we can pass the output
directly to the shell for evaluation.

Change-Id: I8f2bf23a1523f6f02e5ce8563038b20e079b52da
Closes-Bug: #1269908

revisions:
[{'number': 1, 'created': '2014-02-05 10:23:02.000000000', 'files': ['openstack/common/db/sqlalchemy/session.py'], 'message': "Don't raise MySQL 2013 'Lost connection' errors

Closes-bug: #1276510

Although this code error is part of the `ping_listener` tests, it was
missing from the list of known - and ignored - connection errors.

The code error 2013 refers to a connection lost during a query, see:
https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.0/en/error-messages-client.html#error_cr_server_lost

Without this error code, the session won't try to reconnect to mysql,
which makes `max_retries` useless.

Change-Id: If2667cf83ac656666ffe00aa90e3454516b080db
"}]
commit_message:
Don't raise MySQL 2013 'Lost connection' errors

Closes-bug: #1276510

Although this code error is part of the `ping_listener` tests, it was
missing from the list of known - and ignored - connection errors.

The code error 2013 refers to a connection lost during a query, see:
https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.0/en/error-messages-client.html#error_cr_server_lost

Without this error code, the session won't try to reconnect to mysql,
which makes `max_retries` useless.

Change-Id: If2667cf83ac656666ffe00aa90e3454516b080db

commit_message:
Remove release_lease from the DHCP driver interface

Neither the midonet nor the linux dhcp driver needs a call to
release_lease.  Removing this from the driver API simplifies more code
in the DHCP agent.

Change-Id: Ib144b2bf3720b1b999205ace1a7d1ffe5ef3b167
Closes-Bug: #1269505

Use HTTPretty in S3 test code

middleware. This won't work when we convert S3 middleware to use the
requests library.

commit_message:
Clarified applicability of wsdl_location setting

Made the following changes:
* Edited the "VMwareVCDriver configuration options" section by removing
reference to wsdl_location option from code sample.
* Added note that this setting applies only to vSphere versions 5.0
and earlier. Note includes link to "vSphere 5.0 and earlier additional
set up" section below.
* Edited the "vSphere 5.0 and earlier additional set up" section with
text about the wsdl_location option specifically. Added link to the
"VMwareVCDriver configuration options" section above.

Change-Id: I90ffeda3528c98f4a19235798b07ed39f0dae407
backport: havana
Closes-Bug: #1273330

The nova notifier is again broken due to Nova switch to oslo.messaging.

Anyway, it's likely that this code has been broken for a long time, as
it is not enabled nor tested on devstack anymore. And it's very unlikely
compatible with oslo.messaging.

This patch only disable the run of the tests for now, but we might
consider removing the code before i3 if nobody stands up and try to fix

This patch also update the configuration file for the new keystoneclient
release.

Change-Id: I679154baff476957f46e7930db69aeec7e368648
"}]
commit_message:
nova notifier: disable tests + update sample conf

The nova notifier is again broken due to Nova switch to oslo.messaging.

Anyway, it's likely that this code has been broken for a long time, as
it is not enabled nor tested on devstack anymore. And it's very unlikely
compatible with oslo.messaging.

This patch only disable the run of the tests for now, but we might
consider removing the code before i3 if nobody stands up and try to fix
it in a way or another.

This patch also update the configuration file for the new keystoneclient
release.

Change-Id: I679154baff476957f46e7930db69aeec7e368648

commit_message:
Make it clear qpid_hosts order is not to be relied on

Qpid implementation may change the order of qpid_hosts selection. Make
it clear in rabbit_hosts option description.

Users should not expect any particular order of connection attempts.
F.e. users could probably expect that we will always start connection
attempts from the first host in the list, or that we'll switch them
for failover in round-robin order, or that on failover we'll always
restart from the first host in the list. All these options are
somewhat reasonable and are left for implementation to decide.

The change was suggested by Flavio Percoco in private IRC discussion.

Change-Id: Id15c00862f584cd3be8bab9685b27d7ae9b00de1

commit_message:
Hyper-v: Change the hyper-v error log for debug when resize failed

The error message is not sufficient enough for debug of hyper-v
when resize error occured, this patch adding the necessary info
in error log.

Change-Id: Ic8ecb8f08139face2c7bdca258de5e719d81833c
Closes-bug: #1238430

Fix in fuelclient help message

 actions data structure.

revisions:
[{'number': 2, 'created': '2014-02-04 13:11:01.000000000', 'files': ['deployment/puppet/rsyslog/manifests/server.pp', 'deployment/puppet/rsyslog/templates/00-server.conf.erb', 'deployment/puppet/rsyslog/templates/00-remote.conf.erb', 'deployment/puppet/nailgun/manifests/init.pp'], 'message': "Allow multi-ports listen, send to unique rsyslog servers only

- Ensure for any rsyslog server configured only 1st encountered
  proto value will be used by client to send the messages (to
  avoid tcp and udp duplicates)
- Allow multiple listen ports for rsyslog servers with default
  ['514']

Closes-bug: #1276113

Signed-off-by: Bogdan Dobrelya <bdobrelia@mirantis.com>

commit_message:
Allow multi-ports listen, send to unique rsyslog servers only

- Ensure for any rsyslog server configured only 1st encountered
  proto value will be used by client to send the messages (to
  avoid tcp and udp duplicates)
- Allow multiple listen ports for rsyslog servers with default
  ['514']

Closes-bug: #1276113

Change-Id: If80831a2504cd0d0f8e9cc189cab963bb6ebc4ca
Signed-off-by: Bogdan Dobrelya <bdobrelia@mirantis.com>

subject: Pin Sphinx to <1.2
revisions:
[{'number': 1, 'created': '2014-02-05 12:20:26.000000000', 'files': ['tools/test-requires'], 'message': "Pin Sphinx to <1.2

1.2 was just released and has a bug that causes builds to fail with
the error:

  error: 'source_dir' must be a directory name (got `...doc/source`)

See: http://bugs.python.org/issue19570
and: https://bitbucket.org/birkenfeld/sphinx/pull-request/193/builddoc-shouldnt-fail-on-unicode-paths/diff

Change-Id: I0487b4eca8f2755b882689289e3cdf429729b1fb
"}]
commit_message:
Pin Sphinx to <1.2

1.2 was just released and has a bug that causes builds to fail with
the error:

  error: 'source_dir' must be a directory name (got `...doc/source`)

See: http://bugs.python.org/issue19570
and: https://bitbucket.org/birkenfeld/sphinx/pull-request/193/builddoc-shouldnt-fail-on-unicode-paths/diff

[{'number': 2, 'created': '2014-01-07 12:07:17.000000000', 'files': ['neutron/services/loadbalancer/drivers/haproxy/plugin_driver.py', 'neutron/tests/unit/services/loadbalancer/drivers/haproxy/test_plugin_driver.py'], 'message': 'LBaaS: handle NotFound exceptions in update_status callback

LBaaS agent may send update_status requests to server on objects
which were already deleted from db: this is due to creating and
deleting objects with a high rate (like tempest API tests do).
As a result errors and stacktraces appear in server and agent logs.
The proposed solution is to catch NotFound exceptions and print a warning.

Closes-Bug: #1260682

commit_message:
LBaaS: handle NotFound exceptions in update_status callback

LBaaS agent may send update_status requests to server on objects
which were already deleted from db: this is due to creating and
deleting objects with a high rate (like tempest API tests do).
As a result errors and stacktraces appear in server and agent logs.
The proposed solution is to catch NotFound exceptions and print a warning.

Change-Id: I4446b678893d0bda578ad7ccdf3f109cb1c91b4d
Closes-Bug: #1260682

This change deprecates the following parameters:
- public_protocol (replaced by public_url)
- public_address (replaced by public_url)
- public_port (replaced by public_url)
- internal_address (replaced by internal_url)
- internal_port (replaced by internal_url)
- admin_address (replaced by admin_url)
- admin_port (replaced by admin_url)

Add deprecation warnings if any of those values are provided
while maintaining full backward compatibility.

Closes-bug: #1274979
Change-Id: If5b0ae003726c5a99b3a2e22b2aafe1a178bb170
'}]
commit_message:
Introduce public_url, internal_url and admin_url

This change deprecates the following parameters:
- public_protocol (replaced by public_url)
- public_address (replaced by public_url)
- public_port (replaced by public_url)
- internal_address (replaced by internal_url)
- internal_port (replaced by internal_url)
- admin_address (replaced by admin_url)
- admin_port (replaced by admin_url)

Add deprecation warnings if any of those values are provided
while maintaining full backward compatibility.

Closes-bug: #1274979
Change-Id: If5b0ae003726c5a99b3a2e22b2aafe1a178bb170

Add an Hadoop CDH element that installs only HDFS from CDH 4.5

added to support other CDH versions and add full support for the

commit_message:
Add an Hadoop CDH element

Add an Hadoop CDH element that installs only HDFS from CDH 4.5
Comments in the 40-setup-hadoop script indicate where code should be
added to support other CDH versions and add full support for the
distribution. If this version will be accepted, a bug report will be
created to track the missing features.

This element will be used to create an image with Spark, suitable for
use with the Savanna Spark plugin.

Change-Id: I6202e6f5d88cc697af53ff1fd5d23d35c80b2b6d
